name: hygge arrow gloves
notes:
the **hygge arrow gloves** are textured, elegant, and extra cozy! this pattern comes in 3 sizes and offers the option for making both **fingerless gloves** and **mittens**.

this pdf pattern includes written instructions, photos, and links to video tutorials.

please note that this is an ad-free pdf version of a pattern that you can find on my blog for free [here][1].
you can find the pattern for the matching headband **[here][2]**.

**materials**
– 4.0-mm (g/6 us, 8 uk) crochet hook
– dk (3, light) weight yarn
– tapestry needle

**yarn suggestions**
i used knit picks simply alpaca aran weight.
although this yarn is listed as aran (4, medium), it definitely feels like a dk (3, light) weight yarn.
feel free to use any yarn that meets gauge!

**size & yardage** 
this pattern is written for sizes small (medium, large).
**small** – hand circ. 7"-7.5" (18-19 cm) – 109 yds/159 yds 
**medium** – hand circ. 7.5"-8" (19-20.5 cm) – 114 yds/164 yds
**large** – hand circ. 8"-8.5" (20.5-21.5 cm) – 125 yds/175 yds

*this pattern is written in us terms*

**gauge**
9 sts for 3 repeats worked with the wrapped arrow stitch in 2" (5 cm).
